wail.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: to say something in a loud, sad, and complaining way
wail.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: ‘But what shall I do?’ Bernard wailed.
wail.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: to cry out with a long high sound, especially because you are very sad or in pain
wail.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: Somewhere behind them a child began to wail.
wail.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: to make a long high sound
wail.translation[0].definitions[2].examp: The wind wailed in the chimney.
